ygData.subject: Re: Guild- leader
ygData.msgSnippet: I support any local kakis to be guild leader except myself, hehe.. My work required me to work till quite late and I m quite commited to family & gf over
ygData.messageBody:
I support any local kakis to be guild leader except myself, hehe..

My work required me to work till quite late and I'm quite commited to
family & gf over weekends. Let see who rise lvl fastest - meaning he got
lot of time to play, hehe.

Btw Yutaka and I was discussing last night for a all local kakis meet this
coming Sat evening. I think to suit the majority, freeport will be the
best place to meet. I will try my best to attend this gathering. Let fix
a time for meet-up. I can play until morning ;) If not tonight also k -
Friday night is the best time I can play till morning.

On Friday, June 04, 1999 9:40 AM, Alex [SMTP:leealex@...] wrote:
> From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
>
> We need a Former leader.
>
> "A snake without a HEAD will lead no where"
>
> Entreri could Lead.
> -A leader should have the time to do Webpages(with help from members)
> -Time for Guild stuff and duties.
>
> Basically i see a guy with time for not only game play but other related
> guild duties.
> He dont need to be high Lvl.
>
> What's the point of having a leader that cant looks into the Guild needs
and
> only Play -and- Play.
>
> I 'll support any one who could devote to the Guild.
>
> Entreri U r IN.
> Any one else wants to Co-lead with Entreri., Say so. no pai sian one.
>
> Ranking can be informal.
> Leader MUST have one lah.
>
> Lets Do it. Lets ROCK!
>
> Yiyang
> Munk'eying to Qeynos
>
>
>
